text: The 2005 European GP2 round was a GP2 Series motor race held on 28 May and 29 May 2005 at the Nürburgring in Nürburg, Germany. It was the fourth race of the 2005 GP2 Series season. The race was used to support the 2005 European Grand Prix. The first race was won by Heikki Kovalainen for Arden International, with Giorgio Pantano second for Super Nova Racing and Nico Rosberg finishing third for ART Grand Prix. The second race was won by Clivio Piccione for Durango, with Adam Carroll for Super Nova Racing and Nelson Ángelo Piquet for Hitech/Piquet Racing also on the podium. ==Classification== ===Qualifying=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%" !Pos !No !Name !Team !Time !Grid |- !1 |7 | Giorgio Pantano |Super Nova Racing |1:43.862 |1 |- !2 |17 | Gianmaria Bruni |Coloni Motorsport |1:44.128 |2 |- !3 |18 | Neel Jani |Racing Engineering |1:44.176 |3 |- !4 |14 | José María López |DAMS |1:44.266 |4 |- !5 |5 | Ernesto Viso |BCN Competición |1:44.477 |5 |- !6 |23 | Nicolas Lapierre |Arden International |1:44.739 |6 |- !7 |6 | Hiroki Yoshimoto |BCN Competición |1:44.748 |7 |- !8 |1 | Scott Speed |iSport International |1:44.865 |8 |- !9 |11 | Olivier Pla |David Price Racing |1:44.879 |9 |- !10 |8 | Adam Carroll |Super Nova Racing |1:44.914 |10 |- !11 |9 | Nico Rosberg |ART Grand Prix |1:44.989 |11 |- !12 |3 | Nelson Piquet, Jr. |Hitech/Piquet Racing |1:45.331 |12 |- !13 |12 | Ryan Sharp |David Price Racing |1:45.463 |13 |- !14 |24 | Clivio Piccione |Durango |1:45.523 |14 |- !15 |20 | Juan Cruz Álvarez |Campos Racing |1:45.550 |15 |- !16 |19 | Borja García |Racing Engineering |1:45.661 |16 |- !17 |22 | Heikki Kovalainen |Arden International |1:45.737 |17 |- !18 |25 | Ferdinando Monfardini |Durango |1:45.789 |18 |- !19 |4 | Alexandre Negrão |Hitech/Piquet Racing |1:45.946 |19 |- !20 |21 | Sergio Hernández |Campos Racing |1:46.429 |20 |- !21 |2 | Can Artam |iSport International |1:46.503 |21 |- !22 |10 | Alexandre Prémat |ART Grand Prix |1:46.589 |22 |- !23 |16 | Mathias Lauda |Coloni Motorsport |1:46.656 |23 |- !24 |15 | Fairuz Fauzy |DAMS |1:47.266 |24 |} ===Race 1=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%" |- !
